link.description: The Politics & Economics Department (PolEco) focuses on the study and analysis of political systems, economic theories, and their impact on societies across the galaxy. PolEco examines governance structures, policy-making processes, international relations, trade dynamics, and economic development. The department aims to provide insights into how political and economic factors influence the stability, growth, and well-being of civilizations, utilizing data-driven research and interdisciplinary approaches.
